		Tableau correspondant a la fonction Monte Carlo

N	|	Erreur		|	Temps (sec.)	
----------------------------------------
10	|	2.240000000	|	0.000031000
100	|	2.380000000	|	0.000202000
1000	|	2.372000000	|	0.002142000
10000	|	2.350800000	|	0.013388000
100000	|	2.355880000	|	0.092844000
1000000	|	2.354685000	|	0.936380000
